titleStmt.title: A schoole for young souldiers containing in briefe the whole discipline of vvarre, especially so much as is meet for the captaine to teach, or the souldior to learne, that is, to trayne or to be trayned. Fit to be taught throughout England.
titleStmt.author: Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Higginbotham, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Cardnals hat without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in British Library.
Date altered to 1618 in British Library mss-cf. STC.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Cardnals hat without Newgate
